title: Call Father
desc: You are  neither an anchor to hold us back nor a sail to take us forward, but a guiding light whose love shows the way.

title: Call Mother
desc: You are the heart of a home, the first teacher, and the purest form of love.

title: Call Wife
desc: You are not just a partner but a best friend, a supporter, and a reason to smile every day.

title: Go to Sleep
desc: sleep more. why do you sleep less?...

title: Go to Shopping
desc: This week needs to buy rice, oil, eggs...
